players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Bob was a good guy, we should focus on the real threat."
Charlie: "I saw Bob talking to the mafioso last night. We need to investigate him."
Diana: "Bob was a good guy, we should focus on the Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
